title: Cynocephalus Baboon (Thoth)
description:
Small bronze statuette of a seated cynocephalus ape. Conventional type with hands resting on knees. Headdress cannot be identified because of condition. No inscription.
Condition: Poor. Entire surface badly worn and corroded. Headdress broken. Some improvement can be obtained by cleaning. Cast solid in two part mould.
